sentence.Network_cn: 琼非常迷信，认为绿色会带来厄运。

sentence.Network_en: A wave of superstitious fear spread among the townspeople.

list.abs: I have a very superstitious friend called Mack ., 我有个非常迷信的朋友名叫麦克.

The two of them now a superstitious swamp devil , humming , hovering , and plowing through miasma ., 此刻他和蜜蜂都如迷信的沼泽魔鬼 , 嗡嗡叫着 , 盘旋着 , 在瘴气中翻腾.

entry.def: People who are superstitious believe in things that are not real or possible, for example magic.

example.ex: Jean was extremely superstitious and believed the colour green brought bad luck.
example.tran: 琼非常迷信，认为绿色会带来厄运。

entry.def: Superstitious fears or beliefs are irrational and not based on fact.

example.ex: A wave of superstitious fear spread among the townspeople...
example.tran: 盲目的恐惧感在市民中蔓延。

example.ex: In the countryside as a young doctor she encountered ancient superstitious beliefs and prejudices.
example.tran: 作为一名年轻医生，她在乡下见识了古老的迷信思想和偏见。

means.word_mean: 1. showing ignorance or the laws of nature and faith in magic or chance;

sentences.sentence: "finally realized that the horror he felt was superstitious in origin"

auth_sentence.content: Nannies had their own mystiquestheir medical and superstitious lore.
auth_sentence.res_content: Nannies had their own mystiquestheir medical and superstitious lore.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Nannies had their own mystiquestheir medical and superstitious lore.

auth_sentence.content: Non-scientists base their arguments on superstitious beliefs and polemic.
auth_sentence.res_content: Non-scientists base their arguments on superstitious beliefs and polemic.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Non-scientists base their arguments on superstitious beliefs and polemic.

auth_sentence.content: Many superstitious ideas are as old as man himself.
auth_sentence.res_content: Many superstitious ideas are as old as man himself.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Many superstitious ideas are as old as man himself.

stems_affixes.word_buile: con共同+stit建立,放+uent→共同建立的→组成的
con共同+stit建立,放+uent→共同建立的→组成的
super超过+stit站+ion表名词→站在人[理智]之上的东西→迷信

sentences.en: They aim to deliver the people who are in bondage to superstitious belief.
sentences.cn: 他们的目的在于解脱那些受迷信束缚的人。

sentences.en: It is a superstitious idea that the ghost can cast a living man under a spell.
sentences.cn: 鬼魂能迷住人是一种迷信的观念。

sentences.en: All these old novels bear the religions and superstitious characters of the feudal society.
sentences.cn: 所有这些旧小说都具有封建社会的宗教迷信性。

sentences.en: She is superstitious about spilling salt on the table.
sentences.cn: 她迷信把盐倒翻在桌子上的说法。
